job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Deploying machine learning models: Design, develop and deploy in collaboration with scientists, scalable machine learning models and algorithms that provide content related insights and generative AI applications, ensuring scalability, efficiency, and accuracy.
     * Evaluating possible architecture solutions by taking into account cost, business requirements, emerging technologies, and technology requirements, like latency, throughput, and scale.
     * Generative AI Development: Contribute to the development of generative models such as GPT (Generative Pre-trained Transformer) variants or similar architectures for creative content generation, Q&A, translation or other innovative applications.
     * Deployment and integration: Work closely with software engineers to integrate machine learning models into production systems. Ensure seamless deployment and efficient model inference in real-time environments. Collaborate with DevOps to implement effective monitoring and maintenance strategies.
     * Owning a service end to end by actively monitoring application health and performance, setting and monitoring relevant metrics and acting accordingly when violated.
     * Maintain clean, scalable code, ensuring reproducibility and easy integration of models into production environments, including CI/CD.
     * Collaborate with multidisciplinary teams: Collaborate with product managers, data scientists, and analysts to understand business requirements and translate them into machine learning solutions.
job_details.full_text:
Machine Learning Engineer II

* Deploying machine learning models: Design, develop and deploy in collaboration with scientists, scalable machine learning models and algorithms that provide content related insights and generative AI applications, ensuring scalability, efficiency, and accuracy.
     * Evaluating possible architecture solutions by taking into account cost, business requirements, emerging technologies, and technology requirements, like latency, throughput, and scale.
     * Generative AI Development: Contribute to the development of generative models such as GPT (Generative Pre-trained Transformer) variants or similar architectures for creative content generation, Q&A, translation or other innovative applications.
     * Deployment and integration: Work closely with software engineers to integrate machine learning models into production systems. Ensure seamless deployment and efficient model inference in real-time environments. Collaborate with DevOps to implement effective monitoring and maintenance strategies.
     * Owning a service end to end by actively monitoring application health and performance, setting and monitoring relevant metrics and acting accordingly when violated.
     * Maintain clean, scalable code, ensuring reproducibility and easy integration of models into production environments, including CI/CD.
     * Collaborate with multidisciplinary teams: Collaborate with product managers, data scientists, and analysts to understand business requirements and translate them into machine learning solutions.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the development and deployment of generative AI applications, including specific mentions of GPT variants and creative content generation. While it includes ML model deployment and integration, the core focus on generative models, RAG-like applications (Q&A), and building user-facing systems aligns more closely with the GenAI Engineer profile than a general ML Engineer focused on predictive modeling.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'deploying machine learning models: Design, develop and deploy...scalable machine learning models and algorithms' and 'Generative AI Development: Contribute to the development of generative models such as GPT (Generative Pre-trained Transformer) variants or similar architectures for creative content generation, Q&A, translation or other innovative applications' directly relate to the creation, adaptation, and training of models.
job_tasks.phrase: Deploying machine learning models: Design, develop and deploy...scalable machine learning models and algorithms

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Generative AI Development: Contribute to the development of generative models such as GPT (Generative Pre-trained Transformer) variants or similar architectures for creative content generation, Q&A, translation or other innovative applications' explicitly mentions generative models and their applications.
job_tasks.phrase: Generative AI Development: Contribute to the development of generative models such as GPT (Generative Pre-trained Transformer) variants or similar architectures for creative content generation, Q&A, translation or other innovative applications

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Deployment and integration: Work closely with software engineers to integrate machine learning models into production systems. Ensure seamless deployment and efficient model inference in real-time environments.' describes the process of embedding models into larger software systems.
job_tasks.phrase: Deployment and integration: Work closely with software engineers to integrate machine learning models into production systems. Ensure seamless deployment and efficient model inference in real-time environments.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Collaborate with DevOps to implement effective monitoring and maintenance strategies.' and 'Owning a service end to end by actively monitoring application health and performance, setting and monitoring relevant metrics and acting accordingly when violated.' and 'Maintain clean, scalable code, ensuring reproducibility and easy integration of models into production environments, including CI/CD.' directly relate to the operational aspects of deploying and maintaining models in production.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with DevOps to implement effective monitoring and maintenance strategies.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Owning a service end to end by actively monitoring application health and performance, setting and monitoring relevant metrics and acting accordingly when violated.' describes the operational responsibility for a deployed service.
job_tasks.phrase: Owning a service end to end by actively monitoring application health and performance, setting and monitoring relevant metrics and acting accordingly when violated.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Maintain clean, scalable code, ensuring reproducibility and easy integration of models into production environments, including CI/CD.' points to practices and tools used in production deployment and maintenance.
job_tasks.phrase: Maintain clean, scalable code, ensuring reproducibility and easy integration of models into production environments, including CI/CD.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Evaluate possible architecture solutions by taking into account cost, business requirements, emerging technologies, and technology requirements, like latency, throughput, and scale.' shows an understanding of how technical solutions align with business and technical constraints.
job_tasks.phrase: Evaluating possible architecture solutions by taking into account cost, business requirements, emerging technologies, and technology requirements, like latency, throughput, and scale.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Collaborate with product managers, data scientists, and analysts to understand business requirements and translate them into machine learning solutions.' highlights the need to bridge business needs with technical implementation.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with product managers, data scientists, and analysts to understand business requirements and translate them into machine learning solutions.
